alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Jasper; Tyler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 26 at 11:18PM CDT until April 27 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Tyler County in southeastern Texas... North central Hardin County in southeastern Texas... Northwestern Jasper County in southeastern Texas... * Until midnight CDT. * At 1117 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Huntington to near Chester to near Livingston, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Woodville, Colmesneil, Chester, Warren, Ebenezer, Rockland, Wildwood, Ivanhoe and Hillister. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for southeastern Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for southeastern Texas.
